title: Team Omikron
body:
Hey guys,
we are looking for players for our ranked team "Team Omikron". It's a german clan with containts a Black ops 3 Team, aswell. We arelokking for players in all ages but in the elo of platinum and diamond. We want to make our journey to the LCS. Kappa.

To contact us add the user "Guardian Tecno". He will guide you.
